version_description: Now with support for player handicapping and editing times during play! If you enjoy this chess clock, please consider giving it a fresh 5-star rating in the Store. It really helps us out! Thank you.

* More sounds!
* Visual improvements!
* See your total number of moves at a glance!
* Bug fixes!

Fixed a bug that prevented Player Two settings from displaying properly. That's it! If you like this chess timer, please consider giving it a fresh five-star rating or review in the App Store. It really helps us out! Thank you!

Minor improvements and bug fixes. We really hope you enjoy using our chess clock! If so, please tell your friends about it - and consider giving the app a fresh, 5-star rating in the App Store. It helps us a lot! Thank you!

Stay out of time-trouble! We made the clock digits a bit easier to read, and added a few other minor improvements. If you like this clock, you can really help us out by giving it a fresh, 5-star review in the App Store! Thank you so much!
